column3: The purpose of processing personal data

column3: Sector describes the area of application or domain that indicates or restricts scope for interpretation and application of purpose e.g. Agriculture, Banking
column9: There are various sector codes used commonly to indicate the domain of an organisation or business. Examples include NACE (EU), ISIC (UN), SIC and NAICS (USA).
column14: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Javier Fernandez, Axel Polleres, Elmar Kiesling, Fajar Ekaputra, Simon Steyskal

column3: Account Management refers to purposes associated with account management, such as to create, provide, maintain, and manage accounts
column14: Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Beatriz Esteves

column3: Communication Management refers to purposes associated with providing or managing communication activities e.g. to send an email for notifying some information
column9: This purpose by itself does not sufficiently and clearly indicate what the communication is about. As such, it is recommended to combine it with another purpose to indicate the application. For example, Communication of Payment.
column14: Georg P Krog, Paul Ryan, David Hickey, Harshvardhan J. Pandit

column3: Customer Management refers to purposes associated with managing activities related with past, current, and future customers
column14: Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Beatriz

column3: Customer Care Communication refers to purposes associated with communicating with customers for assisting them, resolving issues, ensuring satisfaction, etc. in relation to services provided
column14: Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Beatriz Esteves

column3: Customer Care refers to purposes associated with purposes for providing assistance, resolving issues, ensuring satisfaction, etc. in relation to services provided
column14: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Javier Fernandez, Axel Polleres, Elmar Kiesling, Fajar Ekaputra, Simon Steyskal

column3: Customer Claims Management refers to purposes associated with managing claims, including repayment of monies owed
column14: Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Beatriz

column3: Customer Order Management refers to purposes associated with managing customer orders i.e. processing of an order related to customer's purchase of good or services
column14: Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Beatriz

column3: Customer Relationship Management refers to purposes associated with managing and analysing interactions with past, current, and potential customers
column14: Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Beatriz

column3: Customer Solvency Monitoring refers to purposes associated with monitor solvency of customers for financial diligence
column14: Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Beatriz

column3: Purposes associated with ensuring and enforcing security for data, personnel, or other related matters
column9: Was previous "Security". Prefixed to distinguish from TechOrg measures.
column14: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Javier Fernandez, Axel Polleres, Elmar Kiesling, Fajar Ekaputra, Simon Steyskal

column3: Purposes associated with activities that detect, prevent, mitigate, or perform other activities for anti-terrorism
column14: Harshvardhan J. Pandit

column3: Purposes associated with conducting or enforcing access control as a form of security
column9: Was previously "Access Control". Prefixed to distinguish from Technical Measure.

column3: Purposes associated with detection, prevention, and mitigation of mitigate money laundering
column14: Harshvardhan J. Pandit

column3: Purposes associated with verifying or authorising identity as a form of security

column3: Purposes associated with performing authentication based on identity as a form of security

column3: Purposes associated with conducting marketing in relation to organisation or products or services e.g. promoting, selling, and distributing
column9: Was commercial interest, changed to consider Marketing a separate Purpose category by itself
column14: Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Beatriz Esteves

column3: Purposes associated with conducting direct marketing i.e. marketing communicated directly to the individual

column3: Purposes associated with conducting marketing through social media
column14: Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Beatriz Esteves

column3: Purposes associated with conducting advertising i.e. process or artefact used to call attention to a product, service, etc. through announcements, notices, or other forms of communication
column9: Advertising is a subset of Marketing. Advertising by itself does not indicate 'personalisation' i.e. personalised ads.
column14: Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Beatriz Esteves

column3: Purposes associated with creating and providing personalised advertising

column3: Purposes associated with conducting activities and functions for governance of an organisation
column14: Paul Ryan, Georg P Krog, David Hickey, Harshvardhan J. Pandit

column3: Purposes associated with activities that manage disputes by natural persons, private bodies, or public authorities relevant to organisation
column14: Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Beatriz Esteves

column3: Purposes associated with maintaining a registry of shareholders, members, or partners for governance, administration, and management functions
column14: Paul Ryan, Georg P Krog, David Hickey, Harshvardhan J. Pandit

column3: Purposes associated with managing compliance for organisation in relation to internal policies
column9: Note that this concept relates to internal organisational compliance. The concept LegalCompliance should be used for external legal or regulatory compliance.

column3: Purposes associated with managing risk for organisation's activities

column3: Purposes associated with managing humans and 'human resources' within the organisation for effective and efficient operations.
column9: HR is a broad concept. Its management includes, amongst others - recruiting employees and intermediaries e.g. brokers, independent representatives; payroll administration, remunerations, commissions, and wages; and application of social legislation.
column14: Paul Ryan, David Hickey, Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Beatriz Esteves

column14: Harshvardhan J. Pandit

column3: Purposes associated with management and execution of payment of personnel
column14: Harshvardhan J. Pandit

column3: Purposes associated with manage creation, storage, and use of records relevant to operations, events, and processes e.g. to store logs or access requests
column9: This purpose relates specifiaclly for record creation and management. This can be combined or used along with other purposes to express intentions such as records for legal compliance or vendor payments.
column14: Paul Ryan, Georg P Krog, David Hickey, Harshvardhan J. Pandit

column3: Purposes associated with selling or sharing data or information to third parties

column14: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Javier Fernandez, Axel Polleres, Elmar Kiesling, Fajar Ekaputra, Simon Steyskal

column3: Purposes associated with selling or sharing insights obtained from analysis of data
column9: Sell here means exchange, submit, or provide in return for direct or indirect compensation. Was subclass of commercial interest, changed to reflect selling something
column14: Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Javier Fernandez, Axel Polleres, Elmar Kiesling, Fajar Ekaputra, Simon Steyskal

column3: Purposes associated with selling products or services to the user, consumer, or data subjects
column9: Sell Products here refers to processing necessary to provide and complete a sale to customers. It should not be confused with providing services with a cost based on an established agreement.

column3: Purposes associated with selling products or services
column9: Sell here means exchange, submit, or provide in return for direct or indirect compensation.

column3: Purposes associated with carrying out data processing to fulfill an obligation

column3: Purposes associated with carrying out data processing to fulfill a legal or statutory obligation
column9: This purpose only refers to processing that is additionally required in order to fulfill the obligations and requirements associated with a law. For example, the use of consent would have its own separate purposes, with this purpose addressing a legal requirement for maintaining consent record (along with RecordManagement). This purpose will typically be used with Legal Obligation as the legal basis.
column14: Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit, Beatriz Esteves

column3: Purposes associated with carrying out data processing to fulfill a contractual obligation
column14: Georg P Krog, Harshvardhan J. Pandit

column3: Purposes associated with carrying out data processing to establish an agreement, such as for entering into a contract
